Text:
Excellent Programs. but no clear instructions on how to install it

Instructions:

1. Run WinArchiver28.exe

2. If you do not have associated archive extension, you can use WinArchiver to do so

3. Launch WinArchiver after installation

4. Click on Enter registration code

5. Launch keygen,exe

6. copy data from keygen to Registration

7. Click OK

8. Install WADrive28.exe downloaded from http://www.winarchiver.com/virtual-drive.htm

9. Check the checkboxes as you wish

10. Done !!!
